recipe.title: Butternut Squash and Ginger Relish
ingredients: 1 teaspoon finely grated peeled fresh ginger
2 lb butternut squash, peeled, seeded, and coarsely shredded (5 cups)
instructions: Stir together vinegar, sugar, and salt in a large bowl until sugar and salt are dissolved, then add remaining ingredients and toss well. Chill relish, covered, tossing occasionally, at least 2 hours (to allow flavors to develop) and up to 2 days.
